title: Some websites appear to always have data on my phone. Please help me remove them!
content: Whenever I  clear my browsing history, two websites always appear even though I have not visited them. One appears to be an academic institution's website, while I cannot see what the other is. They follow me through my Google account, as this has happened with my last three phones. Attached is a screenshot. How do I remove these websites and clear the data once and for all?
